code: @Test public void testDelayer() throws Exception {     long start = System.currentTimeMillis().     for (int i = 0. i < 10. i++) {         template.sendBody("direct:start", "Message #" + i).     }     long delta = System.currentTimeMillis() - start.     assertTrue("Should not be that fast to run: " + delta, delta > 100).     // some OS boxes are slow     assertTrue("Should not take that long to run: " + delta, delta < 5000). }
public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception { // do nothing }

// START SNIPPET: e1 public void configure() throws Exception {     // configure delayer for each step 10 millis     getContext().setDelayer(10L).     // regular routes here     from("direct:start").process(new Processor() {          public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {         // do nothing         }     }).to("mock:result"). }
